fields.title: Employment Project (Datasprings)
fields.short_summary: Data aggregation and search platform with Django, Neo4j, and RAG-based search.
fields.long_description: Built a scalable data aggregation platform, integrated LLM-based RAG, AWS deployments, and advanced scraping.
fields.tech_list: Django, Python, Neo4j, AWS, RAG, Selenium

fields.title: Web Scraper Automation
fields.short_summary: Automated data collection using Selenium and BeautifulSoup.
fields.long_description: Designed pipelines for scraping large datasets with cleaning and scheduling.

fields.title: AI-Powered Integration
fields.short_summary: RAG workflows, LLM integration and vector store powered features.
fields.long_description: Integrated AWS Bedrock and vector stores to enable semantic retrieval across datasets.
fields.tech_list: LLMs, AWS Bedrock, Vector DBs, Python
